message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our product with you. I think it's a fantastic opportunity for you to get your hands on a unique item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1300000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1100000. I believe that's a more reasonable price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $1100000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $1250000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the product's value to me.

I'm not willing to go up to $1250000. I'm willing to meet you at $1150000, but that's as high as I'm willing to go. I'm still interested in the product, but I need to make sure I'm getting a good deal.

I understand your position, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $1150000. I'm willing to make one more counteroffer: $1225000. This is as close as I'm willing to get to your offer, but I believe it's still a fair price considering the product's value to me.
I'm still not comfortable with the price, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at $1200000, which is the maximum I'm willing to pay for the product. I'm hoping we can finalize the deal at this price.
